48.ara-name: كتاب الدعوات عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah narrated that:The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: “There are two statements that are light on the tongue, heavy on the Scale, and beloved to Ar-Raḥmān: “Glory is to Allah and the praise; Glory is to Allah, the Magnificent. (Subḥān Allāhi wa biḥamdih, Subḥān Allāhil-Aẓīm)”

chapter.eng-name: Concerning The Virtues Of: “Glory Is To Allah, And With His Praise…”
